name: Glow Staked SOL
description: Glow introduces a suite of financial tools aimed at maximizing capital efficiency and enhancing yield opportunities. By harnessing the speed, scalability, and security of the Solana blockchain and its Solana Virtual Machine (SVM) architecture, Glow provides a flexible and innovative environment for users looking to optimize their strategies. Our cross-margin account capabilities allow for dynamic interaction between assets, enabling users to manage, borrow, and leverage positions within a unified framework. With on-chain margin accounts, and lending pools. Although the GLOW token has not yet had its TGE, this application concerns Glow's restaking token, glowSOL.
